name: $abs
description: Returns the absolute value of a number (the value without regard to whether it is positive or negative)

name: $acos
description: Returns the arccosine of x, in radians.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate arccosine for.

name: $acosh
description: Returns the hyperbolic arccosine of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic arccosine for.

name: $asin
description: Returns the arcsine of x, in radians.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate arcsine for.

name: $asinh
description: Returns the hyperbolic arcsine of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic arcsine for.

name: $atan
description: Returns the arctangent of x as a numeric value between -PI/2 and PI/2 radians.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate arctangent for.

name: $atan2
description: Returns the arctangent of the quotient of its arguments.

name: $atanh
description: Returns the hyperbolic arctangent of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic arctangent for.

name: $base
description: Convert number from one base to another

name: $bigintDivide
description: Divides multiple numbers

name: $bigintMulti
description: Multiplies multiple numbers

name: $bigintSub
description: Subtracts multiple numbers

name: $bigintSum
description: Adds multiple numbers

name: $cbrt
description: Returns the cubic root of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate the cubic root for.

name: $ceil
description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to its numeric argument

name: $cos
description: Returns the cosine of x (x is in radians).

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate cosine for.

name: $cosh
description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic cosine for.

name: $divide
description: Divides multiple numbers

name: $exp
description: Returns the value of E raised to the power of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The power to raise e to.

name: $floor
description: Returns the greatest integer less than or equal to its numeric argument

name: $logn
description: Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of a number

name: $math
description: Run math expression, returns nothing if incorrect expression

name: $max
description: Returns the largest number of the ones given

args.name: numbers
args.description: Numbers among which to find the largest

name: $min
description: Returns the smallest number of the ones given

args.name: numbers
args.description: Numbers among which to find the smallest

name: $modulo
description: Returns the remainder of multiple numbers

name: $multi
description: Multiplies multiple numbers

name: $pow
description: Exponentially multiply multiple numbers

name: $round
description: Rounds provided number to a certain number of decimal places

args.name: decimal places
args.description: The number of decimal places to round to

name: $sign
description: Returns if x is negative, null or positive (-1, 0, 1).

args.name: x
args.description: The number to check the sign for.

name: $sin
description: Returns the sine of x (x is in radians).

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate sine for.

name: $sinh
description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic sine for.

name: $sqrt
description: Returns the square root of a number

name: $sub
description: Subtracts multiple numbers

name: $sum
description: Adds multiple numbers

name: $tan
description: Returns the tangent of x (x is in radians).

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate tangent for.

name: $tanh
description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of x.

args.name: x
args.description: The number to calculate hyperbolic tangent for.

name: $trunc
description: Returns the integer part of the a numeric expression, x, removing any fractional digits. If x is already an integer, the result is x
